author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
Backport of #40807 
(bug-)Fixes the BeamSpot Z position of the `Realistic25ns13p6TeVEOY2022Collision` VtxSmearing scenario from
`0.607956` to `0.101756`.

#### PR validation:
None as this scenario is currently not used anywhere (yet).

#### Backport:
Backport of #40807
title: [13_0_X] Fix BeamSpot Z value in Realistic25ns13p6TeVEOY2022Collision VtxSmearing scenario
